channel.title: Shop items
channel.description: the first item i put in my shops they dont appear. like it starts from the second item instead. i have no errors running or anything. anyone kno how to fix this?

item.title: Shop items
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

You arenâ€™t adding shops in your shops config file correctly.

The syntax is

-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount... etc etc

You must be adding the first item as the Sell/Buy

Read full topic
